comments.content:
Posting something new... fail :-)

That's been posted here before, and before that it was on the H&FJ blog - probably where failblog found it.

[http://www.typography.com/ask/showBlog.php?blogID=67](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017184718/http:/www.typography.com/ask/showBlog.php?blogID=67 "http://www.typography.com/ask/showBlog.php?blogID=67")

it's even been on boing boing,  
if i remember correctly...

-bowerbird
Ok Si, I'll take the FAIL from not remembering it being on the H&FJ blog, but the Typophile search tool gets a FAIL as well (I know it's being worked on, at least).

Chortle, chortle.

It's still funny the second time round!
I don't like the FAIL tag. This was probably a joke perpetrated by the bored librarian who had to stamp the cover.
